About us - Sadh & Associates LLC

We are a team of experienced and qualified professionals who provide consulting and financial planning and analysis (FP&A) services to small and medium-sized businesses. We help our clients improve their performance, optimize their processes, and achieve their goals.

Our Team

Sushil Sadh, CPA - President

Sushil has over 20 years of experience in accounting, finance, and management consulting. He has worked with clients across various industries, including manufacturing, retail, technology, and healthcare. He is passionate about helping businesses grow and succeed.

LinkedIn Profile

Mansha Sadh, CPA - Partner

Mansha has over 5 years of experience in accounting, auditing, and taxation. Her career has seen growth from E&Y to being a consultant at KPMG. She has extensive knowledge of financial reporting, compliance, and risk management. She has served clients in the public and private sectors, as well as non-profit organizations.

LinkedIn Profile

Shreshth Mani - Sr. Consultant & FP&A expert

Shreshth has over 15 years of experience in financial modeling, data analysis, and business intelligence. He has expertise in creating and delivering insightful reports, dashboards, and forecasts. He has supported clients in various domains, such as education, hospitality, and entertainment.

LinkedIn Profile

Michael Cohen - Sr. Tax preparer & advisor

Fondly known as Mike, has over 25 years experience in tax preparation and advisory servicing the San Antonio customer base for most of his career. He is well versed with high net-worth tax preparation.

LinkedIn Profile
